channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Cattle ranchers talk to wolves by blasting AC/DC’s ‘Thunderstruck’ or dialogue from movies: ‘I am not putting up with this anymore!’
item.description: A preliminary study released in 2022 demonstrated that adding human voices through a loudspeaker rigged onto a drone can freak out the numerous Gray W...

item.title: How Trump Could Overhaul the Fed
item.description: The president wants to pack the central bank’s Board of Governors with loyalists, which would grant him greater sway over an institution that is suppo...

item.title: Punjab Floods Devastate Pakistan’s Breadbasket
item.description: Housing communities and businesses that rely on agriculture have been destroyed in the country’s largest province.

item.title: Redistricting Push Creates Chaos for Incumbents in Both Parties
item.description: Republicans and Democrats in Congress are wary of the potential consequences of President Trump’s drive to redraw districts.

item.title: Indonesia’s Leader Says He Will Bow to Some Protester Demands After Riots
item.description: President Prabowo Subianto of Indonesia acknowledged the concerns of the protesters and said his government would make concessions.

item.title: Lack of ‘civility’ is costing business $2 billion a day, according to the top HR research body. Here’s how to crack down on office rudeness, they say
item.description: SHRM's Jim Link told Fortune that companies should beware "Digital bravery," or saying whatever you want "from the safety and security of your screen....

item.title: Government shutdown, CDC fight, Epstein probe, stock trading ban dominate agenda as Congress returns from recess
item.description: The most urgent task for Congress is to avoid a government shutdown on Sept. 30, when federal funding runs out.

item.title: ‘Just another nail in the coffin for rural areas’: Affordable housing program faces the axe under Trump’s tax, budget cuts
item.description: The HOME program has helped build or repair over 1.3 million homes in the last 30 years, 540,000 of them in rural districts, the AP found.

item.title: BofA’s president of Global Commercial Banking on best practices for securing the legacy of a multigen family business
item.description: In the U.S., some 32 million family-owned businesses contribute $7.7 trillion to GDP every year.

item.title: Videos Contradict Israel’s Rationale for Deadly Hospital Attack
item.description: The strikes on Nasser Hospital in Gaza killed at least 20 people. A Times visual analysis calls into question what the Israeli military was initially ...

item.title: Xi Uses Summit, Parade and History to Flaunt China’s Global Pull

item.title: Judge Temporarily Blocks U.S. Efforts to Deport Guatemalan Children

item.title: Introducing Our New Game
item.description: We show you how to play Pips, a new Times puzzle.
